home.title: Home
home.logInWarning: WARNING: You are not logged in. You can still use this tool to generate a JSON-LD description of your parking, but you will not be able to save it into our catalog.

lang.title: Data Languages
lang.infoAlert: Please select all the languages you want to use to describe your Bicycle Parking.
lang.warningAlert: Please select at least one language

name.infoText:
The name of the bicycle parking as it is locally known.

Example: Fietsparking Rector De Somerplein

localID.infoText:
The local code used for the bicycle parking.

Example: APCOA_018

openingDate.infoText:
The date the bicycle parking was opened / will open (can also be used for temporary bicycle parkings).

Example: 03/25/2019

closingDate.infoText:
The date the bicycle parking was closed / will be closed (can also be used for temporary bicycle parkings).

Example: 03/25/2019

regulations.infoText:
The link / URL where information can be found about the bicycle parking.

Example: http://www.projectgentsintpieters.be/frontend/files/userfiles/files/kaarten/150220_reglementfietsenstalling.pdf
regulations.placeholder: Enter the link for the regulations document

description.infoText:
Put here some general information that you find important for visitors to know.

Example: Parking under the plaza, is open for all types of bicycles, maximum 1 week, no staff on site but camera surveillance available.

street.infoText:
The name of the street and number where the parking is located.

Example: Rector De Somerplein 8
street.placeholder: Enter the street name and number

postal.infoText:
Postal code of the bicycle parking.

Example: 3000

website.infoText:
Put here a link to the website of the owner of the bicycle parking.

Example: https://www.leuven.be

name.infoText:
Put here the name of the organization that owns the bicycle parking.

Example: Stad Leuven

website.infoText:
Put here a link to the website of the operator of the bicycle parking.

Example: https://www.apcoa.be

name.infoText:
Put here the name of the organization that is responsible for the day-to-day operations.

Example: APCOA PARKING

website.infoText:
Put here a link to a contact form or a website where customers can contact the operator.

Example: https://www.apcoa.be/contact/

email.infoText:
Put here the e-mail address where users can send questions / remarks / requests / complaints to.

Example: fietsenparking.leuven@apcoa.be

phone.infoText:
Put here the phone number where users can reach the operator.

Example: 016 29 93 23

url.infoText:
Put here a link to a picture of the bicycle parking, its surroundings or facilities.

Example: https://www.apcoa.be/fileadmin/MDMImageImport/4e35c3a7f62e2c89b9a991b9db1b7800.jpeg
url.placeholder: Enter here the photo URL or choose a file image

operation.title: Facility Section - Operation Information
operation.infoText: If the parking has only one section, the information entered here will be valid for the entire facility.

sectionName.infoText:
An optional name of the bicycle parking section as it is locally known.

Example: Green zone

type.infoText:
Select what type of bicycle parking applies to this section.

Example: Bicycle parking station

levels.infoText:
Enter here the number of levels in the bicycle parking.

Example: 2

public.infoText:
Can anybody park her / his bike here, or do you need a key or badge?

Example: Yes

maxDur.infoText:
Define here the maximum number of consecutive days a bicycle can stay in the parking.

Example: 21

audience.infoText:
Describe who can park their bike here.

Example: Brede publiek
audience.placeholder: Enter the intended audience (e.g. general public, neighborhood residents)

restrictions.infoText:
Describe the restrictions of use of this parking garage.

Example: Geen bromfietsen
restrictions.placeholder: Enter the restrictions (e.g. maximum 2 bikes per resident)

removal.infoText: Describe on what conditions / when a bike will be removed from the bicycle parking.Example: Fietsen die foutief of meer dan 14 dagen gestald zijn, worden verwijderd.
removal.placeholder: Describe the conditions to be met for removing a bike (e.g. exceed maximum storage time)

postRemoval.infoText:
Describe how, when and how cyclists can recover a bike that was removed.

Example: Verwijderde fiertsen kunnen gedurende drie maanden opgehaald worden bij het centraal depot. Daarna worden ze verkocht of vernietigd. (zie contactgegevens voor mail / telefoon).
postRemoval.placeholder: Describe what to do after a bike gets removed (e.g. Contact APCOA on 0473 33 89 11)

openingHours.title: Opening Hours
openingHours.infoText:
Indicate when this section is open (if there is only one section, this goes for the entire bicycle parking). You can add days with the + symbol if the opening hours differ from day to day.

Example: Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu 09:00 - 17:00
Fri, Sat, Sun 10:00 - 16:00
openingHours.noItemsError: Please add at least one opening hour entry.

extrainfo.infoText:
Describe extra irregularities for the opening hours.
Example: Open every first Sunday of the month or closed on bank holidays
extrainfo.placeholder: Describe special cases like holidays or special openings

point.title: Main Entrance
point.text: Select the location of the main entrance of this parking facility in the map:

lat.infoText: Indicate on the map the main entrance of this section of the bicycle parking.

lon.infoText: Indicate on the map the location of this section of the bicycle parking.

polygon.text: Draw the Parking Facility geometry in the map:

geoPolygon.infoText: Draw the boundaries of this section of bicycle parking on the map.
geoPolygon.placeholder: Enter the polygon points e.g. POLYGON ((30 10, 40 40, 20 40, 10 20))

entrance.title: Extra Entrances
entrance.text: Select the Entrance location in the map:

lat.infoText: Indicate the entrance of the parking on the map. If there are multiple entrances, use the + symbol.

lon.infoText: Indicate the entrance of the parking on the map. If there are multiple entrances, use the + symbol.

description.infoText:
Describe how users can find the entrance of the parking (if there are multiple entrances, use the + symbol).

Example: De ingang bevindt zich aan beide zijden van het plein. Opgelet: verboden te fietsen in de stalling!

exit.title: Exit
exit.text: Select the Exit location in the map:

lat.infoText: Indicate the exit of the parking on the map. If there are multiple exits, use the + symbol.

lon.infoText: Indicate the exit of the parking on the map. If there are multiple exits, use the + symbol.

description.infoText:
Describe how users can find the exit of the parking (if there are multiple exits, use the + symbol).

Example: De uitgang bevindt zich aan beide zijden van het plein. Let op: verboden om in de garage te fietsen!

allowed.title: Facility Section - Allowed Bicycles
allowed.infoAlert: Here you can enter the different types of bicycles someone can store in this facility section.
allowed.noItemsError: Please add at least one bicycle type that is allowed in this facility section.

type.infoText:
Select here the types of bicycles allowed in this parking section.

Example: Regular bicycle - Electrical bicycle - Cargo bicycle

capacity.infoText:
Indicate the maximum amount of bicycles of this type allowed in this section.

Example: 250

counting.infoText:
Does the parking have a system to count how many bicycles of this type are parked?

Example: Yes / No

generalservices.title: General Services
generalservices.infoAlert: Here you can add special features this facility section provides. Take a look at the available options.

feature.infoText:
Select the services or facilities that are available or can be used in this section of the parking garage.

Example: Bicycle Pump

security.title: Security Features
security.infoAlert: Here you can add security features this facility section provides. Take a look at the available options.

feature.infoText:
Select the security features that are available or can be used in this section of the parking garage.

Example: Camera Surveillance

availableHours.title: Hours Available
availableHours.infoText:
Select the days and hours this feature is available or active in the parking section.

Example: Maintenance Service: Mon, Wed, Fri 09:00 - 12:00.

description.infoText:
Put here a link to a webpage that describes the costs.

Example: https://www.antwerpen.be/nl/info/5a7315bdb4ce55c720254e2f/ontdek-twee-nieuwe-buurtfietsenstallingen
description.placeholder: Enter the link to the costs description

spec.title: Price Specification
spec.infoAlert:
In this section you can specify the cost per time interval that users have to pay to park their bikes. For example, if the first hour is free and afterwards it costs €1 for every 2 hours this means you need to add 2 time intervals:

  - the first one with a duration of one hour that is free, and
  - a second one with a duration of 2 hours that costs €1.

IMPORTANT! The last section you add gets repeated indefinitely. Following the previous example, this means that the users need to pay €1 for every extra 2 hours of parking.

free.infoText:
Is this price specification free of charge?

Example: Yes / No

price.infoText:
Indicate here the price (if any) for this price specification.

Example: 10

overnight.infoText:
Is this price specification valid from one day to the next?

Example: Yes / No

timeStart.infoText:
Indicate the start time of this price specification.

Example: 0

timeEnd.infoText:
Indicate the end time of this price specification.

Example: 1

intervalDuration.infoText:
Indicate the duration of this price specification interval.

Example: 1
intervalDuration.placeholder: Enter the duration of the interval (in the unit selected above)

timeUnit.infoText:
Select the time unit used to specify the pricing intervals.

Example: Hour

description.infoText:
Describe how this price specification operates.

Example: Gratis voor het eerste uur
description.placeholder: Describe this pricing definition (e.g. free for the first hour)

extraSection.title: Facility Section - Add Extra Section
extraSection.text: Would you like to add another section to this bicycle parking?

publish.title: Data Publishing
publish.infoText:
If you want to publish the data on your own website, enter the URL in the box below.
If you leave it empty the data file will be stored and published at http://www.velopark.be.

URI.infoText:
The URL where the data about this bicycle parking will be published.

Example: https://www.leuven.be/parkings/nl/fietsen/fietsparking-rector-de-somerplein

In case you don't have one we will provide it based on the Parking Owner and the Local Identifier, and publish the data for you.

Example: https://velopark.ilabt.imec.be/data/APCOA_018

lostPasswd.title: Password Recovery
lostPasswd.successText: An email has been dispatched to you. We sent you a link which you can use to enter a new password for your account.

transfer.title: Transfer parking
transfer.text: Select the company you want to transfer this parking to.

cityRep.title: Regions Dashboard
cityRep.warningNotApproved: Your request for managing this region hasn't been approved by the system administrator yet.

pswdReset.changeMessage: Have you forgotten your password? In this page you can set new one.
pswdReset.success: Your password has been updated! You can now log in using your new credentials.
